review: Awesome. Fast. Used everything and this is top notch. Like apple TV but 1/4th the cost and maybe smoother. Supports xbmc as well. Get one hands down period.
author: Grant Rummel

review: Love it, so easy to install and setup.  Now I can use my Prime on my main TV.  In the past I was accessing Prime through my Samsung Blu-Ray player in my bedroom which was not as useful as accessing it in my Great Room on our largest TV.  We had tried Google Chromecast in the past but had too many installation problems, Fire Stick seems much easier and a better product.
author: Amazon Customer "Cruiser"

review: Works just as good as the more expensive Fire TV.  The only down side I noticed is it doesn't come with the voice search remote.  Great product and good value.
author: Elijah L. Scott "Eli"

review: Awesome! I love this and use it everyday. I no longer have a cable bill and use this to watch Netflix, Hulu, and Amazon Prime video.
author: Boardwalksailir

review: I'm just beginning to play with the new unit, but so far I'm impressed by the ease of accessibility and the variety of things that are accessible through Amazon Prime. So far, its my favorite Christmas gift to myself.
author: Sandy Heiss

review: This thing had to update before it could be used, but the update continued to fail for the first couple of days.  Other than that, it has a pretty smooth operating interface.
author: Richard S

review: It's amazing. Bravo Amazon!  Works with my Slingbox.  Clearly worth twice the price.  Buy it!  It's easier to use than Apple TV!  just as good, if not better than Chromecast!  I have all of them.  Fire TV Stick is a great value.  Comes with remote too.
author: Amazonian

review: Awesome! Very fast! The iphone app controller is cool as well. This is much faster than the Chromecast that i use on my downstairs tv. I am very surprosed about the speed of the GUI and ease of use. IF you buy this, you will not be disappointed!
